body_html:
@tom888888
Did you try to put your dummy_input into GPU/CUDA before the export as following?

dummy_input = Variable(torch.randn(1, 3, 224, 224)).cuda()
torch.onnx.export(model_ft, dummy_input, "resnet152.onnx",export_params=True)
body_text:
@tom888888
Did you try to put your dummy_input  into GPU/CUDA before the export as following?
dummy_input = Variable(torch.randn(1, 3, 224, 224)).cuda()
torch.onnx.export(model_ft, dummy_input, "resnet152.onnx",export_params=True)
body:
@tom888888 
Did you try to put your `dummy_input ` into GPU/CUDA before the export as following?

```
dummy_input = Variable(torch.randn(1, 3, 224, 224)).cuda()
torch.onnx.export(model_ft, dummy_input, "resnet152.onnx",export_params=True)
```
